structured_notes_xml:
<structured_notes>
    <project_name>ShopEasy E-Commerce Test</project_name>
    <company_overview>Not specified</company_overview>
    <attendees>
        <attendee>CEO</attendee>
        <attendee>CTO</attendee>
        <attendee>Product Manager</attendee>
        <attendee>Lead Developer</attendee>
        <attendee>UX Designer</attendee>
        <attendee>Marketing Director</attendee>
    </attendees>
    <meeting_date>November 2, 2025</meeting_date>
    <meeting_objective>Main e-commerce platform discussion</meeting_objective>
    <key_discussion_points>
        <point>User authentication</point>
        <point>Product catalog with search & filters</point>
        <point>Shopping cart functionality</point>
        <point>Payment processing</point>
        <point>Order management system</point>
        <point>Admin dashboard</point>
        <point>Mobile app</point>
    </key_discussion_points>
    <pain_points>
        <pain_point>Monolithic architecture</pain_point>
        <pain_point>Overkill for MVP</pain_point>
    </pain_points>
    <requirements>
        <requirement>User registration/login</requirement>
        <requirement>Product listing & details</requirement>
        <requirement>Shopping cart</requirement>
        <requirement>Checkout with Stripe</requirement>
        <requirement>Order confirmation</requirement>
        <requirement>Reviews</requirement>
        <requirement>Wishlist</requirement>
        <requirement>Email notifications</requirement>
        <requirement>Search</requirement>
    </requirements>
    <decisions_made>
        <decision>Phase 1: Core e-commerce (browse, cart, checkout)</decision>
        <decision>Phase 2: User features (reviews, wishlist, account)</decision>
        <decision>Phase 3: Advanced features (recommendations, analytics)</decision>
        <decision>Phase 4: Scale & optimize</decision>
    </decisions_made>
    <action_items>
        <action_item>Develop MVP</action_item>
        <action_item>Design wireframes</action_item>
        <action_item>Plan development roadmap</action_item>
    </action_items>
    <technical_constraints>
        <constraint>Technical stack: React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Redis, Elasticsearch, AWS</constraint>
        <constraint>CI/CD pipeline with automated testing</constraint>
    </technical_constraints>
    <stakeholders>
        <stakeholder>CEO</stakeholder>
        <stakeholder>CTO</stakeholder>
        <stakeholder>Product Manager</stakeholder>
        <stakeholder>Lead Developer</stakeholder>
        <stakeholder>UX Designer</stakeholder>
        <stakeholder>Marketing Director</stakeholder>
    </stakeholders>
</structured_notes>
